identifier="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" description="The legacy Telestream video processing library is RGB-based. It offers automated gamut correction and allows advanced overlays such as GraphicsFactory and Screen open subtitling. However, the original library is single-threaded, has fewer options for standards conversion, and requires configuration to ensure color space preservation." name="Legacy 8-bit RGB 4:4:4" essence="video" /><soa:Processor identifier="b26a46c3-19ff-4e25-bcc9-ea3413d481bc" description="The multi-core CPU-based processing library operates in full 16-bit 4:4:4:4 YCbCr color space. It can be configured to use multiple CPU cores, and it offers more advanced algorithms for de-interlacing and resizing than the legacy processing library." name="Multi-core 16-bit YCbCr 4:4:4:4" essence="video" /><soa:Processor identifier="54565b66-7857-45af-9bdc-8b45a23895cc" description="The Lightspeed Accelerated processing library requires a Lightspeed Server. It uses GPU acceleration to significantly increase transcoding performance; it also offers more advanced algorithms for de-interlacing and resizing than the legacy processing library." name="Lightspeed Accelerated 16-bit YCbCr 4:4:4:4" essence="video"><soa:Feature identifier="b63b2f4c-8210-4f12-bba5-80819ae99b2f" name="Lightspeed Session" restriction="inoperable" version_year="2013" version_month="09" version_day="04" /></soa:Processor><soa:Processor identifier="834e4f09-063e-44fe-a2a3-06a6bf75da1c" description="Cinnafilm Tachyon offers GPU accelerated high-quality video processing with excellent inverse telecine and standards conversion capability." name="Cinnafilm Tachyon" essence="video"><soa:Feature identifier="6e3f997d-77b4-4079-907f-48dd5b53bd1b" name="Tachyon License" restriction="inoperable" version_year="2013" version_month="09" version_day="04" /></soa:Processor></soa:Encoder>
